abstract: JPMorgan Chase vice chairman James B. Lee Jr. was honored last night at The New York Public Library. Stephen Schwarzman, the chairman of Blackstone Group introduced him by saying, “Jimmy Lee has lent more money than anyone in the history of the world. It’s truly astounding and he’s gotten virtually all of it back.”
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase vice chairman James B. Lee Jr. was honored last night at The New York Public Library. Stephen Schwarzman, the chairman of Blackstone Group introduced him by saying, “Jimmy Lee has lent more money than anyone in the history of the world. It’s truly astounding and he’s gotten virtually all of it back.”
